August Summer Dining Menus Now thru August 31 It’s the perfect time to try something new or return to your favorite local spot. Enjoy special three-course dinner menus starting at $70 per person at Echo, Henry’s Palm Beach and The Italian Restaurant. Need lunch plans? Henry’s is also offering a two-course daytime menu for $35 per person. Echo : Reserve | Menu Henry’s : Reserve | Lunch Menu | Dinner Menu The Italian Restaurant : Reserve | Menu Peach Month August 1 – 31 A toast is in order: August is National Peach Month. To honor one of our favorite fruits, we’re offering a selection of peach-inspired beverages throughout our bars and restaurants. A few of our favorites? Henry's Palm Beach: Peach Bourbon Smash HMF: Palm Peach Cocktail Flagler Steakhouse: Peach Mojito and a special Warm Peach Cobbler Seafood Bar: Peach Blossom Martini Ocean House & The Surf Break: Botanical Peach & Orange Spritz Explore our restaurants and bars . September Flavor South Florida September 1 - 30 It’s the perfect time to try something new or return to your favorite local spot. Enjoy special three-course dinner menus starting at $70 per person at Echo, Henry’s Palm Beach and The Italian Restaurant. Need lunch plans? Henry’s is also offering a two-course daytime menu for $35 per person. Echo : Reserve | Menu Henry’s : Reserve | Lunch Menu | Dinner Menu The Italian Restaurant : Reserve | Menu October Harvest Moon Festival at Echo October 3 - 5 Echo is The Breakers’ ode to modern pan-Asian cuisine. In honor of the Harvest Moon Festival, celebrating the biggest and brightest full moon of the year, the restaurant has created a special three-course menu of traditional delicacies. To reserve your table, simply book online or call (877) 724-3188. Halloween Sips & Treats October 31 Even our cocktails are getting festive this month. Enjoy specialty drinks throughout our bars and restaurants. Explore our restaurants and bars . Halloween Soirée at HMF October 31 6 PM – 12 AM When HMF throws a haunted soirée, you know it’s time to don your best costume and eat, drink and be scary! Enjoy a festive special menu featuring Monster Lobster Roll, Squid Ink Arancini, Black Lagoon Seabass Ceviche and Mini Cider Donuts. Plus, enjoy spooktacular specialty cocktails and desserts. Costumes encouraged. November Thanksgiving Celebrations | November 27 Thanksgiving Lunch & Dinner at Flagler Steakhouse 11 AM – 9 PM $245 per person $75 for children ages 12 and younger Give thanks with a truly decadent meal at Flagler Steakhouse, The Breakers’ modern take on the classic American steakhouse. In honor of Thanksgiving, our chef has developed a special, three-course holiday prix-fixe menu featuring the classics, like Butter Basted Tom Turkey and Pumpkin Pie to Steakhouse favorites like Surf & Turf, Bone-in Filet and Key Lime Pie. Reservations are required and open for hotel guests and club members on September 2; reservations open to local guests on October 15. To reserve your table, simply call (561) 659-8471. Thanksgiving at Henry's Palm Beach 11 AM - 10 PM Celebrate the holiday at your favorite neighborhood spot. In addition to our all-day dining menu and daily brunch, enjoy a special Thanksgiving Turkey entree. Reservations are recommended. Reserve your table online or call (877) 724-3188. Thanksgiving Dinner in the Ponce de Leon Ballroom 2 PM – 6 PM $285 per person, $100 for children ages 12 and younger Leave the cooking to us and enjoy the afternoon in the Ponce de Leon Ballroom, adorned from top to bottom in festive harvest décor. Our elaborate, artful buffet offers everyone’s Thanksgiving favorites, as well as unexpected items and an array of decadent desserts and sweet treats. Reservations are required and open for hotel guests and club members on September 2; reservations open to local guests on October 15. To reserve your table, simply call (877) 724-3188. December HMF Social Palm Beach Food & Wine Festival December 12 | 3 PM $175 per person Step into the chic ambiance of HMF for an enchanting afternoon of refined bites, effervescent bubbles, a curated selection of Rosé and artfully crafted high tea-inspired cocktails. This soirée blends creative indulgence with timeless sophistication. Celebrate at HMF - one of only three venues in the country to receive the Wine Spectator Grand Award annually since its inception - a true toast to excellence. Purchase tickets at pbfoodwinefest.com/events/hmf-social . Christmas Eve at Flagler Steakhouse December 24 | 4 PM – 9 PM $245 per person $75 for children ages 12 and younger Celebrate in style with special three-course, prix fixe menus featuring all of your holiday favorites. Dine alfresco on the terrace or sit inside at a cozy table and leave the cooking to us. Reservations are required and open for hotel guests and club members on September 2; reservations open to local guests November 12. To reserve your table at Flagler Steakhouse, simply call (561) 659-8471. Christmas Day Celebrations | December 25 Christmas Day at Flagler Steakhouse 11 AM – 9 PM $245 per person $75 for children ages 12 and younger Celebrate in style with special three-course, prix fixe menus featuring all of your holiday favorites. Dine alfresco on the terrace or sit inside at a cozy table and leave the cooking to us. Reservations are required and open for hotel guests and club members on September 2; reservations open to local guests November 11. To reserve your table at Flagler Steakhouse, simply call (561) 659-8471. Holiday Brunch in The Circle 12 PM – 3 PM $285 per person $100 for children ages 12 and younger Begin the holiday with an elaborate, spirited brunch at The Circle, one of the resort’s most stunning spaces. Indulge in an exquisite, one-of-a-kind buffet and festive desserts as you sip unlimited Champagne cocktails, bloody marys and The Breakers’ custom-blended wine. Reservations are required and open for hotel guests and club members on September 2; reservations open to local guests November 12. To reserve your seat, simply call (561) 653-6362, ext. 7865. Holiday Dinner in the Ponce de Leon Ballroom 2 PM – 6 PM $285 per person $100 for children ages 12 and younger It’s the most wonderful time of the year—celebrate this special day with us in our stunning Ponce de Leon Ballroom, trimmed in twinkling lights and festive décor. Our elaborate buffet offers the very best of the holidays including the Christmas classics and much more. Plus, indulge in an array of festive desserts—from peppermint bark and crème brûlée to ornately decorated cakes and pies—a sweet ending to a luxurious holiday feast. Reservations are required and open for hotel guests and club members on September 2; reservations open to local guests November 12. To reserve your seat, simply call (877) 724-3188. New Year’s Eve Events | December 31 Echo, Henry’s Palm Beach, The Italian Restaurant, Seafood Bar, Ocean House and The Surf Break will be open normal hours, serving their regular menus. Flagler Steakhouse New Year’s Eve Dinner 5 PM – 10 PM $425 per person Make your last meal of the year your most memorable one. In honor of New Year’s Eve, Flagler Steakhouse—The Breakers’ modern take on the classic American steakhouse—has created a special, three-course prix-fixe menu. Reservations are required and open for hotel guests and club members on September 2; reservations open to local guests November 12. To reserve your table, simply call (561) 659-8471. HMF New Year’s Eve Celebration 8:30 PM – 12:30 AM $1,200 per person It’s the last (and most glamorous) night of the year. Celebrate it in proper Palm Beach style at HMF. Enjoy a special menu of chef-selected items and a midnight Champagne toast—all as you enjoy live entertainment, dancing and a balloon drop. Reservations are required and open for hotel guests and club members on September 2; reservations open to local guests November 12. To reserve your table, simply call (561) 653-6362, ext. 7375 or email [email protected] . Get social: join the conversation Please note that all menus and prices are subject to change. In addition, all prices listed are subject to a service charge and state sales tax. Festive Family Fun The only thing better than celebrating a special event with family? Celebrating it together at The Breakers. Explore our special holiday events . Explore More - Special Offers: Vacation Savings - Restaurants that raise the bar: Dining - Suite dreams: Accommodations - Room to roam and reconnect: Activities - Tranquility awaits: The Spa

The only thing better than celebrating with family? Celebrating at The Breakers. Year-round Happenings Get some activities on the books and spark your family’s excitement. View our daily resort activities . Holiday Fun Discover an array of festive events and creative activities—all designed with family in mind. Labor Day Weekend August 25 - 31 Kick off the long weekend with a leisurely bicycle ride around the island, then relax by the pool and enjoy watersports at the beach. The fun continues with poolside spin art, laser tag, movie night and more. Don't miss the End of Summer Carnival (August 30) with caricature and balloon artists, face painting, ice cream treats and more. View the full lineup of activities . Carousel Plugin End Carousel Plugin Family Fun Family is the very heart of The Breakers—hence the endless offerings designed just for kids (and for the kid in you). Explore family activities . Holiday Dining The food, the festivities, the family and dear friends—here, celebrations are best enjoyed around the table. Explore dining special events .

Google Tag Manager Skip to main content MENU CALL Check Availability Accommodations Guest Rooms Suites Flagler Club Accessible Rooms & Suites Amenities Browse All Accommodations Activities Pools & Beach Bungalows The Spa Fitness Golf Racquet Sports Shopping Family Activities Holiday Events Browse All Activities Dining HMF Flagler Steakhouse Seafood Bar Echo Henry’s Palm Beach The Italian Restaurant The Circle The Beach Club Restaurant Ocean House The Surf Break In-Room Dining Sunday Brunch Special Events & Holidays Browse All Dining Events Meetings Weddings & Celebrations Venues & Floor Plans Browse All Events Special Offers Resort Offers Dining Offers Browse All Special Offers Photos About The Breakers Mobile App Memberships Gift Cards Contact Us Careers Call: Check Availability Check Availability End Check Availability Module Memberships You’re in the club Too good to be true? Almost. Introducing membership at The Breakers Ocean Club: distinctive offerings that unlock a new dimension in luxury. Ocean Membership Four glittering pools, six whirlpool spas, 10 restaurants, 13 shopping boutiques—it’s all at your fingertips when you choose to become an esteemed Ocean Member at The Breakers. By day, enjoy unbridled access to the resort’s private beach, two fitness centers, two golf courses and new world-class racquet facilities with 12 tennis courts, two dedicated pickleball courts and two padel courts. By night, gather with your family and friends at any of our restaurants and bars—from the glamorous HMF social club to Flagler Steakhouse, our classic-meets-contemporary take on fine American dining. What’s more, your membership comes with exclusive perks and complimentary services—from preferred accommodation rates and exclusive discounts at our shops, restaurants and spa to gratis green fees at both the Ocean Course and the championship Rees Jones® Course. VIEW BROCHURE Beach & Tennis Membership Outdoor enthusiasts, look no further. Our coveted Beach & Tennis Membership grants you complete access to The Breakers’ Beach Club, an idyllic oceanfront oasis complete with four pools, six whirlpool spas, direct beach access and several beloved restaurants and bars. Just beyond the property’s Beach Club, treat friends to a game of doubles our new world-class racquet facilities, or opt for a private lesson with one of our pros. After your match, recline in the privacy of a private poolside bungalow, or retreat to our luxury indoor-outdoor spa. Your membership also provides exclusive discounts at our shops, spa, restaurants and bars. Golf & Tennis Membership Few things can evoke the resort lifestyle quite like golf. Here at The Breakers, our Golf Membership gives way to the golfer’s dream: complete access to 36 holes of golf, as well as our new world-class racquet facilities, which feature 12 tennis courts, two dedicated pickleball courts and two padel courts. From first tee to your final cocktail after the 18th hole, every detail of your golfing experience is elevated by membership. Enjoy complimentary green fees at both the Ocean Course and the championship Rees Jones Course®, as well as complimentary court times, and exclusive discounts at our shops, spa and many of our bars and restaurants. CONTACT US Ready to Join? To learn more about unique membership privileges, pricing and requirements, submit your inquiry. Or, speak with someone by calling (877) 724-4068. For Our Members Membership at The Breakers means one-of-a-kind service. If you’re a current member and have a question or special request, simply call us at (877) 724-4068.

Google Tag Manager Skip to main content MENU CALL Check Availability Accommodations Guest Rooms Suites Flagler Club Accessible Rooms & Suites Amenities Browse All Accommodations Activities Pools & Beach Bungalows The Spa Fitness Golf Racquet Sports Shopping Family Activities Holiday Events Browse All Activities Dining HMF Flagler Steakhouse Seafood Bar Echo Henry’s Palm Beach The Italian Restaurant The Circle The Beach Club Restaurant Ocean House The Surf Break In-Room Dining Sunday Brunch Special Events & Holidays Browse All Dining Events Meetings Weddings & Celebrations Venues & Floor Plans Browse All Events Special Offers Resort Offers Dining Offers Browse All Special Offers Photos About The Breakers Mobile App Memberships Gift Cards Contact Us Careers Call: Check Availability Check Availability End Check Availability Module About The Breakers Palm Beach Once you stay, you'll understand ® Founded on the sands of Palm Beach in 1896, our resort’s story has been one of strong roots ever since—holding true to our values while evolving in a changing world. A brief history In the late 1890s, just before the turn of the century, industry tycoons and elegant socialites began flocking to the pristine shores of a new destination—a long strip of an island called Palm Beach. It was our founder Henry M. Flagler, one of America’s great industrialists, who started the trend of grand, gorgeous properties on the island. His first was The Royal Poinciana, a six-story Georgian beauty. Two years later, Flagler debuted his premier oceanfront hotel, which delighted guests with its proximity to the water and unique location—right at “the breakers,” where the waves crashed and sprayed. After fires in both 1903 and 1925, the hotel reemerged more opulent each time. The second reconstruction of The Breakers was awarded to New York City-based designers Shultze and Weaver, the same minds who would later create many of Manhattan’s most coveted hotels: the Pierre, the Sherry-Netherland and Park Avenue’s Waldorf Astoria. Described by the duo as “the acme of perfection in design and magnificence,” The Breakers reopened in 1926, ushering in a higher degree of European influence and architectural flair. Flagler’s newest iteration was modeled after the magnificent Villa Medici in Rome—an ambitious effort that called for 75 artisans brought in from Italy. Together they completed the intricate paintings, detailed across the ceilings of the 200-foot-long main lobby and first-floor public rooms, which remain on display today. It was a grand gesture that placed The Breakers in a class all its own. Year by year, the resort’s reputation grew and word spread, beckoning the glitterati to vacation in Palm Beach year-round. At any given time, the guest register read like a “who's who” of early 20th-century America: Rockefellers, Vanderbilts, Astors, Andrew Carnegie and J.P. Morgan, vacationing alongside US presidents and European nobility. Today, the story of The Breakers continues, holding fast to the ideals that put it on the map—unapologetic luxury, seaside glamour and world-class service—but also embracing the new. In our modern world that is more interconnected than ever before, we’re fully committed to our employees, our environment and the enduring mission of our organization. Green initiatives Across our resort grounds, we implement ecologically friendly practices that conserve resources and protect the environment, promising an enhanced quality of life for future generations. Our efforts epitomize The Breakers’ devotion to environmental stewardship while maintaining the distinctive quality and world-class service that guests expect of our resort. These green endeavors include energy efficiency, water conservation and waste reduction. The Breakers is committed to expanding and enhancing all of our environmental programs to protect and preserve our precious natural resources. Social impact As a modern organization employing 2,400 people, our sense of social responsibility extends to our team, our environment and our community. From employee wellness and sustainable practices to community enrichment and powerful partnerships, our commitments not only ensure our enduring success, but also contribute to a sense of greater good. To learn more about our perspective on corporate citizenship and the evolution of our culture of well-being, please explore our Annual Report . View the video transcript |  Listen to the audio transcript Peek inside: Resort Overview Photo Gallery Resort Amenities Property Maps Historical Timeline Video: The Living Legacy of The Breakers Video: Down By The Breakers: A Palm Beach Story Learn More To learn even more about what sets The Breakers apart, explore our brochure.

At any given time, the guest register read like a “who's who” of early 20th-century America: Rockefellers, Vanderbilts, Astors, Andrew Carnegie and J.P. Morgan, vacationing alongside US presidents and European nobility. Today, the story of The Breakers continues, holding fast to the ideals that put it on the map—unapologetic luxury, seaside glamour and world-class service—but also embracing the new. In our modern world that is more interconnected than ever before, we’re fully committed to our employees, our environment and the enduring mission of our organization. Green initiatives Across our resort grounds, we implement ecologically friendly practices that conserve resources and protect the environment, promising an enhanced quality of life for future generations. Our efforts epitomize The Breakers’ devotion to environmental stewardship while maintaining the distinctive quality and world-class service that guests expect of our resort. These green endeavors include energy efficiency, water conservation and waste reduction. The Breakers is committed to expanding and enhancing all of our environmental programs to protect and preserve our precious natural resources. Social impact As a modern organization employing 2,400 people, our sense of social responsibility extends to our team, our environment and our community. From employee wellness and sustainable practices to community enrichment and powerful partnerships, our commitments not only ensure our enduring success, but also contribute to a sense of greater good. To learn more about our perspective on corporate citizenship and the evolution of our culture of well-being, please explore our Annual Report .
